mapper.insert: INSERT INTO launchpool (launchNo, exchange, title, status, startDate, endDate) VALUES (#{launchNo}, #{exchange}, #{title}, #{status}, #{startDate}, #{endDate})
INSERT INTO pooldetail (launchNo, name, total, minimum, maximum) VALUES (#{launchNo}, #{name}, #{total}, #{minimum}, #{maximum})
mapper.select: SELECT launchNo, title, startDate FROM launchpool WHERE exchange = #{exchange} ORDER BY startDate DESC LIMIT 3
